author: Staff Reporter
text:
Another enumeration of people engaged in manual scavenging will begin in all municipalities and town panchayats of Kancheepuram district.

The Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment is assisting the three-day enumeration, officials said.

Regional Director of Municipal Administration, Chengalpattu, N.S Prema said the objective of the drive is to identify those who were left out in the previous enumeration done in 2014.

She appealed to people, activists voluntary and private organisations to help in identifying such workers and help them rehabilitate at the respective centres of the local body.

The plan is to identify those involved in cleaning unhygienic toilets, septic tanks, open drains and waste along railway lines. Sembakkam Municipal Commissioner, K. Rajendran said the enumeration is being done following the death of four people who were choked to death while cleaning a sewage tank at a restaurant on Rajiv Gandhi Salai in Thoraipakkam last month. —staff reporter
title: Manual scavenging: enumeration from Monday
